title: Bitcoin, Netflix, Peloton, Coinbase: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Netflix warned of slower subscriber growth; Cryptocurrencies were broadly down
body:
Stock futures are falling after disappointing earnings reports from some popular technology stocks. Here’s what we’re watching at the end of a rough week on Wall Street:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
